about_the_game:
Rods:

  • FATWood© Catzilla 320

Reels:

  • PROFish© Scrub 1400

Lines:

  • AYA 0.38

Floats:

  • UNIFloats© Catfish B0 (2x 2 types)
  • FATWood© Uni BT

Artificial baits:

  • REALFish© RL Eel (2x)

Hooks:

  • Wide Gap #1/0 (10x)
  • Wide Gap #3/0 (5x)
  • Wide Gap #6/0 (5x)
  • Wide Gap #7/0 (5x)
  • Aberdeen #1 (10x)
  • Aberdeen #1/0 (10x)

Natural baits:

  • Live fish (30x)
  • Liver (30x)
  • Corn (20x)
  • Catfish bait (50x)

Bags:

  • Rod case
  • Backpack

Other:

  • Echo Sounder (Pro)
  • Fishing Net 100 kg

Boats:

  • FATWood© Boat T (E)

VIP:

  • 14 Days

name: Professional Fishing: Catfish Kit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 2GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Do not you want to wait for catfish fishing equipment? You do not need! This set contains everything you need to catch catfish! Hooks, floats, lures and much more!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
